subtopics.header: Rules related to "Chat" and communication with other users
desc: Be nice to people. Respect people. Don't be rude or mean to people. This include any racist comments or jokes.
Follow US laws (PBO is based in the US). Keep the game as PG as possible (Drugs included), minors also play the game, don't distribute pirated material, and don't slander others.
Don't impersonate staff if you're not.
Do not spam, flame, or troll. This includes advertising, raiding, asking questions with one-word answers in the lobby, and flooding the chat
English only, unless specified otherwise.
We reserve the right to tell you to stop discussing moderator decisions if you become unreasonable or belligerent.
Advertising of other pokemon related games should be avoided.
Sexual references in chat other than crew/private is prohibited.
Harassing others is prohibited.
Spoiling quests on global chat is prohibited.
Calling other people by insulting names will lead to a mute and an eventual ban.
You may not exploit errors in design ("bugs") or features which have not been documented to gain access which is otherwise not available or to gain an advantage over other Users;

While participating in Player vs Player (PvP) gameplay, You may not participate in any form of match manipulation. Match manipulation is defined as any action taken to manipulate the outcome of a match, or alter or manipulate any official rankings;
Stalling battles during Crew Wars is strictly prohibited, if found the entire crew will be held responsible and will be wiped of tokens and deleted.

You may not use cheats, automation software (commonly known as "scripts", "macros", or "bots"), hacks, or any third-party software which can be detrimental to other users' experience, nor will You relay or store any items for other users who are using these processes;

No more than 1 account per IP, if found exploiting bugs or loopholes via multi-accounts, all the accounts with that ip will be banned. (If you have brothers or sisters or other members playing, please speak with moderator or admin over discord or in game)
Account sharing is done at your own risk.

You may not use the Game or any Service for any commercial purpose without the express written consent of Pokemon Blaze, including but not limited to gathering in-game currency, items, resources, or performing services for sale outside the Game (commonly known as "Real Money Trading");
You may not defraud other Users of in-game currency, items, resources, or services to be performed (commonly known as "Scamming").

desc: When you choose a character name, a username, a Crew name, or otherwise create a label which can be seen by other users when using our Services, you must abide by the following guidelines.

Belongs to another person with the intent to impersonate that person, including Pokemon Blaze's Staff or any other User of Pokemon Blaze's Services;

Incorporates bigotry or hate speech;
Is sexually suggestive or pornographic;
References any form of criminal activity or drugs;
Makes inappropriate references to the human anatomy or bodily functions;
Is comprised of gibberish; or
Uses misspellings or alternative spellings of any of the above guidelines.
Do note: This list may not include all disallowed usernames, just the general guidelines. Pokemon Blaze reserve the right to ban/remove any names they deem inappropriate.
You may not attempt to or facilitate any attempts to bypass any restrictions set in place against User Accounts or Characters;
